name: Vibhor Mungee
about_me: Full‑stack engineering leader with 14 years of experience architecting and delivering high‑performance web platforms and cross‑platform mobile apps. Specialties include React (Web/Native), Vue, Next.js, Node.js/Express/Nest, GraphQL, serverless architectures, and cloud on AWS and GCP. Proven track record leading teams, modernizing legacy systems, and building scalable, secure, and maintainable solutions for fintech, logistics, retail, and public sector.
what_do_i_do: I design and ship reliable software at scale: discovery and solution architecture, iterative delivery, performance optimization, and CI/CD. Typical engagements include migrating monoliths to modern stacks, building cloud‑native APIs and frontends, improving developer experience, and implementing observability and security best practices to accelerate business outcomes.
